      • setAmmoBag

        public void setAmmoBag(int numRed,
                       int numYellow,
                       int numBlue)
                throws TooManyException
        Set player's ammo to value indicated by params. If some param is grater than three the relative ammo is set to 3
        Parameters:
        numRed - new value of red ammo
        numYellow - new value of yellow ammo
        numBlue - new value of blue ammo
        Throws:
        TooManyException - if some of param are grater then 3

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns:
        True if the player is dead, false if not

        public boolean isOverKilled()
        Returns:
        1 if the player has been over killed, 0 if not

        it respawns the player after death

        bolean true if connected, false if not

        public void addPowerupCard(PowerupCard powerupToAdd)
                    throws TooManyException
        Add a powerup to the player list
        Parameters:
        powerupToAdd - powerup to add
        Throws:
        TooManyException - if the player has already three powerups

      • containsPowerup

        public boolean containsPowerup(PowerupCard powerupCard)
        return true if player has the card, otherwise false
        Parameters:
        powerupCard - the card you want to control
        Returns:
        true if player has the card, otherwise false

      • addWeaponCard

        public void addWeaponCard(WeaponCard weaponToAdd)
                   throws TooManyException
        Add a weapon to the player list
        Parameters:
        weaponToAdd - weapon to add
        Throws:
        TooManyException - if the player has already three + 1 weapon the one in exception is due to the fact the player can discard any weapon instead of the one just picked

      • receiveDamageBy

        public void receiveDamageBy(Player enemy)
                     throws NotPresentException,
                            YouDeadException,
                            YouOverkilledException
        Add damage to this player
        Parameters:
        enemy - who had damaged you
        Throws:
        NotPresentException - If player has been already killed
        YouDeadException - If player dies in this turn
        YouOverkilledException - If player is over killed in this turn

      • resetDamage

        public void resetDamage()
        Set all the damage of the player to zero

      • resetTargetsForTagBack

        public void resetTargetsForTagBack()
        Reset the targets for tagBack grenade. Call it at the start of the player of the turn

      • receiveMarkBy

        public void receiveMarkBy(Player enemy)
                   throws TooManyException
        Mark this player with a enemy's mark
        Parameters:
        enemy - who had marked you
        Throws:
        TooManyException - if enemy had already marked you three times

      • removeMarkReceivedBy

        public void removeMarkReceivedBy(Player enemy)
        When someone shoot me, all my mark made by the shooter has to be eliminated and converted in damage. Remove all marks made by enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemy - who made marks I want to remove

      • loadWeapon

        public void loadWeapon(int weaponID)
                throws NotPresentException,
                       WeaponIsLoadedException,
                       NotEnoughAmmoException
        Load the weapon selected, using ordinary ammo and ammo gained from discarded Powerups.
        Parameters:
        weaponID - the ID of the weapon
        Throws:
        NotPresentException - if the Player doesn't have this weapon
        WeaponIsLoadedException - if the weapon is already loaded
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if there's not enough ammo from ordinary ammo and discarded Powerups

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard(PowerupCard powerupCard,
                        boolean isRespawnOrUse)
                 throws NotPresentException
        Discard a Powerup card. If it's discarded explicity by the player in order to gain the corresponding ammo, it adds the ammo in the temporary ammo. If not used for a cost in the turn, the ammo will vanish.
        Parameters:
        powerupCard - the card which has to be discarded
        isRespawnOrUse - true if it's a respawn or it is used (don't add temporary ammo), false if not (add temporary ammo)
        Throws:
        NotPresentException - if the card is not possessed by the Player

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard(WeaponCard weaponToDiscard)
                 throws NotPresentException
        Discard a weapon
        Parameters:
        weaponToDiscard - the weapon to discard
        Throws:
        NotPresentException - if the player doesn't have the card

      • canPayAmmo

        public boolean canPayAmmo(AmmoBag cost)
        controll if the player can pay the cost (powerup discarded are counted in the calculation)
        Parameters:
        cost - AmmoBag cost
        Returns:
        true if the Player can pay it, false if not

      • payAmmoCost

        public void payAmmoCost(AmmoBag cost)
                 throws NotEnoughAmmoException
        the Player pays the ammo cost
        Parameters:
        cost - the AmmoBag cost
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the Player can't pay

      • isVisibleBy

        public boolean isVisibleBy(Map onThisMap,
                           Player shooter)
        Check if the player can be see by another on the specific map
        Parameters:
        onThisMap - The map on which the two player are
        shooter - The enemy who could see this player
        Returns:
        True if it's visible, false otherwise.

      • endTurnSetting

        public void endTurnSetting()
        must be called after the turn of the player to set parameters

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(Cell position)
        Move player to a new cell. It change also the player list on the cell!
        Parameters:
        position - the new cell of the player

      • setConnected

        public void setConnected(boolean isConnected)
        set status of the connection of the player
        Parameters:
        isConnected - true if connected, false if disconnected

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compare the player based on the ID, the nickname and the character. Character could be null.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - The other player to compare
        Returns:
        True if the two players have the same ID, nickname and character. False otherwise.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      • setFrenzyDeath

        public void setFrenzyDeath()
        If player die during the last turn or in frenzy mode set isFrenzyDeath as true. In this case the player can be cash only for 2-1-1-1 points and not for 8-6-4-2-1-1.

      • clone

        public Player clone()
        Deep clone of player for the view. Not all the attributes are copied, only the NOT transient!
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Deep copy of player

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String the full player, representing each attributes with symbol and color. Work with UTF-8 and ANSI code.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The representation of the player

      • setCharacter

        public void setCharacter(Character character)
        Set the character of the player if it was never set before
        Parameters:
        character - The character to set
